About the Company: BCC Fuba India Ltd is engaged in designing, manufacturing and selling high-tech printed circuit boards (PCBs).The company manufactures single-sided, double-sided and multilayered printed circuit boards. They focus primarily on the multi-layer PCBs produced with HDI/microvia technology. These products are used in mobile handsets, telecommunication infrastructure, automotive and other industrial applications.
